Subject: || Implementation- Ventura Pranas-Logs backup-02042025 ||
Description:
Dear Team,

Customer is getting the error as shown in image attached
What_We_Know__c:
Connected to the backend and saw that they have 19 GB in shadows and 4.5 in Mailer.
-They performed a snapshot of the VM today (3 April)

- Deleted shadows, some backups and the mailer, and now it uses only 25% from /var/eppfiles partition
Next_Steps__c: To connect again on 4th of April and to delete shadows and mailer
Solution_Comment__c:
Deleted shadows, some backups and the mailer, and now it uses only 25% from /var/eppfiles partition
The customer confirmed during the meeting that the case can be closed now
